meanings.definition: Members of a religious community of women living under a rule.
meanings.sent1: The canonesses gathered for their daily prayers in the chapel.
meanings.sent2: The canonesses worked together to maintain their convent.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the canonesses' gardening tools.
meanings.sent4: The canonesses stood as pillars of strength in their community.
meanings.sent5: The colorful robes of the canonesses fluttered in the wind as they walked.

meanings.definition: The collective body of such women.
meanings.sent1: Visitors were impressed by the unity of the canonesses in their tasks.
meanings.sent2: The canonesses' choir filled the halls with harmonious melodies.
meanings.sent3: The canonesses' laughter echoed through the corridors of the convent.
meanings.sent4: The canonesses formed a protective circle around the new member.
meanings.sent5: The kindness of the canonesses shone through their actions towards others.

meanings.definition: The rank or office of a canoness.
meanings.sent1: She aspired to reach the esteemed position of canoness within the community.
meanings.sent2: The ceremony marked her promotion to the title of canoness.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten knocked over the canonesses' ink pot.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication and wisdom exemplified the qualities of a true canoness.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of a canoness required both leadership and compassion.
